issue.title: OTP (One time password) wrong usage of a dynamic variable
issue.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

Notice:  Undefined variable: _anInteger_ in [joomla]/components/com_easysdi_shop/controllers/order.php on line 226

Wrong usage of "Variable variable" ($$) in /components/com_easysdi_shop/controllers/order.php

**Fixed versions :** 4.5.0
